00021 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00022 {
00023   createinfo(argc, argv);
00024 
00025   int c;
00026   int spinfree=0;
00027   int multi=0;
00028 
00029   if (argc < 3) {
00030     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s gndfile fmdparafile"
00031             "\n         -s      free spin gndfile"
00032             "\n         -m      multi gauss gndfile\n",
00033             argv[0]);
00034     exit(-1);
00035   }
00036   
00037   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "sm")) != -1)
00038     switch (c) {
00039     case 's':
00040       spinfree = 1;
00041       break;
00042     case 'm':
00043       multi = 1;
00044       break;
00045     }
00046   
00047   char* gndfile = argv[optind];
00048   char* fmdparafile = argv[optind+1];
00049 
00050   char name[255];
00051   int A; int ng;
00052   char buf[1024];
00053   
00054   FILE* gndfp = fopen(gndfile, "r");
00055 
00056   do
00057     fgets(buf, 255, gndfp);
00058   while (buf[0] == '#' || buf[0] == '\n');
00059   sscanf(buf, "%s", name);
00060 
00061   do
00062     fgets(buf, 255, gndfp);
00063   while (buf[0] == '#' || buf[0] == '\n');
00064   if (multi)
00065     sscanf(buf, "%d %d", &A, &ng);
00066   else {
00067     sscanf(buf, "%d", &A);
00068     ng = 1;
00069   }
00070 
00071   int i;
00072 
00073   do
00074     fgets(buf, 255, gndfp);
00075   while (buf[0] == '#' || buf[0] == '\n');
00076 
00077   int xi[A*ng]; int chi; 
00078   double alpha, beta;
00079   double cre, cim;
00080   double are, aim, x[3], p[3];
00081   complex double newA[A*ng], newB[A*ng][3];
00082   complex double newChi[A*ng][2];
00083   int j;
00084 
00085   for (i=0; i<A*ng; i++) {
00086     if (spinfree) {
00087       sscanf(buf, "%d  %lf %lf %lf  %lf %lf %lf  %lf %lf %lf %lf", 
00088              &xi[i], &x[0], &x[1], &x[2], &p[0], &p[1], &p[2], &are, &aim, 
00089              &alpha, &beta);
00090 
00091       newChi[i][0] = cos(0.5*alpha);
00092       newChi[i][1] = sin(0.5*alpha)*cexp(I*beta);
00093     } else if (multi) {
00094       sscanf(buf, "%lf %lf  %d %d  %lf %lf %lf  %lf %lf %lf  %lf %lf",
00095              &cre, &cim,
00096              &xi[i], &chi, &x[0], &x[1], &x[2], 
00097              &p[0], &p[1], &p[2], &are, &aim);
00098       if (chi == +1) { newChi[i][0] = cre+I*cim; newChi[i][1] = 0.0; }
00099       else           { newChi[i][0] = 0.0; newChi[i][1] = cre+I*cim; }
00100     } else {
00101       sscanf(buf, "%d  %d %lf %lf %lf  %lf %lf %lf  %lf %lf", 
00102              &xi[i], &chi, &x[0], &x[1], &x[2], 
00103              &p[0], &p[1], &p[2], &are, &aim);
00104       if (chi == +1) { newChi[i][0] = 1.0; newChi[i][1] = 0.0; }
00105       else           { newChi[i][0] = 0.0; newChi[i][1] = 1.0; }
00106     }
00107     newA[i] = are + I*aim;
00108     for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00109       newB[i][j] = x[j] + I*newA[i]* p[j];
00110     
00111     fgets(buf, 255, gndfp);
00112   } 
00113   fclose(gndfp);
00114 
00115   int Z=0, N=0;
00116   for (i=0; i<A; i++) {
00117     if (xi[ng*i] == +1) Z++;
00118     if (xi[ng*i] == -1) N++;
00119   }
00120 
00121   // write FMD parameters to file
00122 
00123   FILE* parafp = fopen(fmdparafile, "w");
00124 
00125   fprintinfo(parafp);
00126 
00127   fprintf(parafp, "\n<Parameterization FMD>\n");
00128   fprintf(parafp, "<Para FMD %s>\n", name);
00129   fprintf(parafp, "%2d %2d %2d\n", A, Z, N);
00130   fprintf(parafp, "%2d\n", A*ng);
00131   for (i=0; i<A*ng; i++)
00132     fprintf(parafp, "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00133             i / ng, xi[i], 
00134             creal(newChi[i][0]), cimag(newChi[i][0]), 
00135             creal(newChi[i][1]), cimag(newChi[i][1]),
00136             creal(newA[i]),      cimag(newA[i]), 
00137             creal(newB[i][0]),   cimag(newB[i][0]),
00138             creal(newB[i][1]),   cimag(newB[i][1]), 
00139             creal(newB[i][2]),   cimag(newB[i][2]));
00140   fprintf(parafp, "</Para>\n");
00141 
00142   fprintf(parafp, "\n\n<SlaterDet>\n");
00143   fprintf(parafp, "%2d %2d %2d\n", A, Z, N);
00144   fprintf(parafp, "%2d\n", A*ng);
00145   for (i=0; i<A*ng; i++)

00147             i / ng, xi[i],
